name: MAMMU
wishText: Thinking of you on your birthday and wishing you everything happy ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many Many Happy Returns Of The Day...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: It’s not necessary to have hundreds of friends when really a heart touching friendship is all you need. I’m glad I found my one true best friend in you, girl.
replayText: I’m wishing you the very happiest of birthdays today and a year ahead that’s filled with joy and bliss
